features: Amazing Play Remote: This realistic toddler remote toy features channels keys and volume buttons to imitate a TV remote perfectly in switching different channels and adjusting volume. Pressing buttons, let your baby experience the real life in imitation. The 6 9 12 18 months baby can feel the fun of this funny remote toy.

Nice Melodies & Multi Languages: This baby musical toy with soft light and plays over 50 music, sound effects and numbers, help strengthen important senses such as vision and hearing. With 3 languages: English, French and Spanish. Babies can learn different languages while playing.

Safe for Babies: Made of high quality ABS plastic, BPA-Free, and not easy to fade. The surface of this baby TV remote toy is smooth, no sharp corners, raw edges, no harm to children’s skin. Perfect for your little child to hold and play. There is a screw on the battery cover so that kids can’t access the batteries.

Early Education Learning Toys: Babies over 6 months are curious about everything. Our educational remote control toy with colorful buttons, introduce shapes colors and numbers to cultivate baby’s cognition and thinking ability. Each button features number texture to enhance sensory stimulation. Encourages and helps your baby to explore and learn.

Best Gift for Kids: This baby toy remote is a perfect gift for 1 year old boys girls, toddlers and newborn babies. Keeps baby busy for a long time playing with the toy remote for baby. You won’t believe how much this small kid remote toy can do. Let babies enjoy their own remote controller!
body.description: Realistic channel keys: Imitate the real tv remote setting to swift different channels by up and down key. Each button can switch a different sound. Baby can experience the reality during imitation, help baby to accumulate life experience. Adjustable volume, if you don't want to be disturbed by the sound of the toy, you can adjust the volume at any time to make it quieter. With automatic sleep mode, no operation is required, power saving and energy saving.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Does your baby like playing TV remotes? Don’t worry, this educational remote toy for baby can help you solve this problem.Our remote control toy looks like a real remote, fun for toddlers. There is a bear print, lovely while imitating!Your toddler can enjoy imitative fun while playing with the TV remote control toy that looks just like mom and dad’s!

Baby Realistic Musical TV Remote Control Toy Keep your baby entertained: The sound and soft light can entertain baby, and stimulating your baby’s fine motor skills.Makes so many sounds, such as gentle music, the numbers, the sound of animals and vehicles, has a flash light on the top when you push buttons. Designed for babies: High-quality speakers, clear and not harsh. The volume of this baby musical remote toy is specially designed for babies and it won’t hurt baby’s hearing when the toy placed close to their ears. Learning and playing: Through this imitative play, the toy introduces early concepts around numbers and shapes as children exercise their fine motor skills.Allows babies to learn the pronunciation of three languages through play. Improve baby's language learning ability.

Realistic channel keys: Imitate the real tv remote setting to swift different channels by up and down key. Each button can switch a different sound. Baby can experience the reality during imitation, help baby to accumulate life experience. Adjustable volume, if you don't want to be disturbed by the sound of the toy, you can adjust the volume at any time to make it quieter. With automatic sleep mode, no operation is required, power saving and energy saving. Package Content: Baby remote control toy User's manual Exquisite packaging box

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most used toy!
reviews.reviewText: My grandaughter loves this remote for her son. Looks like the real deal & distracts toddler from chaos with the real one! So many different sounds yet not too loud. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars looks like a real remote
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a remote that actually looked like a real remote. No tricking this toddler.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Daughter loves remotes so she likes how you can press buttons and makes sounds and like the different options it has on it. Also educational.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars baby loves this
reviews.reviewText: Hard to clean, but not super loud and very convincingly a remote control. Similar weight and look. Quality of the audio sounds a littlecheap but honestly whatever. Baby loves it and leaves the real remotes alone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Holy wow it feels so real. Love all the different sounds, and that the power button is it's actual on off just like a real remote the volume is it's up down. Grate quality from the texture of the buttons down to the feel of the plastic and even the weight of it. Even how the buttons move it just feels so much like the real deal. If I didn't know any better I'd think it was my TV remote 😅 Perfect gift for a little one. I'd say anywhere from age 6m and up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Our boy is at the stage where he wants tv remotes, cellphones and tablets. This is nice because it’s his very own remote we give him and not having to worry about him changing the channel ect. The volume button controls the volume on it, same with the power button is the on/off and there is different languages.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more tantrums!
reviews.reviewText: This toy remote is exactly what I needed. My 18 month old was always crying for the TV remote which we keep hidden because the battery is a lethal choking/burning hazard. So I bought him this realistic toy remote with a screw in battery door he can't pop off and now he couldn't be happier!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect remote placebo
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my 12 month old who’s obsessed with the remote. I don’t like to give her the remote because then I have to take the batteries out and place them somewhere unreachable- because swallowing a battery is INCREDIBLy dangerous for a toddler or child. She also loves to hit the buttons and accidentally purchase random programming. In comes this lovely fake out remote. It keeps her occupied if I have to cook, it keeps her from crocodile rolling during a diaper change and it just all around is a great distraction if I need some time to do ANYTHING without worrying about the real remote being unsafe or getting broken.
